articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles run the Washington Commanders ragged to win 55-23 and reach their second Super Bowl in three years.
articles.title: NFL play-off results: Philadelphia Eagles reach Super Bowl 59 after beating Washington Commanders

articles.description: All the latest football news and Premier League reaction as Tottenham lose again, leaving manager Ange Postecoglou's future in doubt.
articles.title: Premier League latest: Postecoglou's future at Spurs, Man Utd win at Fulham, transfers latest

articles.description: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim suggests he'd rather give a place on the bench to his 63-year-old goalkeeping coach over Marcus Rashford because of effort.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Ruben Amorim suggests he'd rather pick 63-year-old coach over forward

articles.description: Tottenham are on a seven-match winless run in the Premier League but it is chairman Daniel Levy - not manager Ange Postecoglou - that is bearing the brunt of supporters' anger.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Why are Tottenham fans angry at chairman Daniel Levy?

articles.description: Jomel Warrican ends with match figures of 9-70 as West Indies secure their first Test win in Pakistan for 34 years, ensuring the two-match series finishes 1-1.
articles.title: West Indies seal first Test win in Pakistan for 34 years to level series

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for Hobart Hurricanes v Sydney Thunder in the KFC Men's Big Bash League on BBC Sport.
articles.title: Hobart Hurricanes v Sydney Thunder - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: Jannik Sinner continues to be an unstoppable force in men's tennis as the Australian Open champion becomes the first Italian to win three major titles.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Jannik Sinner will be 'one of greatest players we've ever seen' after Melbourne victory

articles.description: Australian-born Alex Masibaka, who plays for Angouleme in the second tier in France, is a shock call-up to Scotland's Six Nations squad.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Scotland call up Alex Masibaka of Angouleme

articles.description: Why the Premier League is likely to earn an extra Champions League spot - and how there could be seven English clubs in next year's competition.
articles.title: Champions League: Will Premier League get extra spot for next season?

articles.description: Brentford are so confident in Bryan Mbeumo's penalty-taking abilities his team-mates are celebrating before he even strikes the ball.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo's penalty: Yoane Wissa celebrates before Brentford goal
